name: Goatanic Wipeout
description:
Eat all the plants in the level! Can you complete all 20 of them? How fast?

Plants that are already eaten will grow back shortly after, so you really want to find the most efficient route to eat them all!

Plants that are not standing on solid ground are growing on ivy. There's always a plant on top of any ivy, so be sure to check those out too!

BACKGROUND:

This is my actual first project I've ever picked up and finished all the way through, so I'm really happy that the result is something actually playable and somewhat enjoyable. It was super fun to make too!

The idea for a goat eating invasive plant species came up from this apparently established business that makes use of actual goats as herbicides, which I thought was super hilarious: https://www.goatsonthego.com.

I first thought about a lemmings kind of game, but I'm still a noob with GameMaker so I opted for a much simpler genre which I had at least some kind of experience programming.

CONTROLS:

The game is super simple, Z or SPACEBAR for Jumping and WASD or ARROW KEYS for movement.

Hope you like it!
